name: The simpsons Treehouse of horror Recharged
name_original: The simpsons Treehouse of horror Recharged
description:
The simpsons Treehouse of horror Recharged is a fighting game developed by kevinandraous. It came out on 07-08-2019.
The simpsons Treehouse of horror Recharged is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
